text: Tamagerfa huno mopa tamimo'a havizantfa higeno, Jerusalemi kumapina vahera omanitfa hu'ne. Hianagi etema esnaza mofavre nagakamo'za Jerusalemi kumara eme mani titipa hanageno kankamuna omanena, kagri'ma ha' eme hugante'za kazeri havizama hu'naza vahe'mo'za tvaonka'arera ome'za afete manigahaze.
